Coinbase Automated Carding Bot

What is a Carding Bot?

Welcome to the automated Bitcoin carding tutorial, we will use cardingbot.ru for this guide.

A carding bot is an app developed to perform carding activities with minimal user activities. It has an integrated VPN/proxy system, mailing system, Captcha solving APIs, etc. with just simple mouse clicks, the bot can card supported sites in minutes. Most of the integrated functionalities require premium API keys to work, so to use the bot you need some credits to perform some action on the bot.

The best bot is made for desktops running Windows, This is the most successful bot as a PC offers a good environment and strong resources to run proxies and VPN. In this guide, we will use a bot from cardingbot.ru

 

Carding Bot Official Version 1.1

Official version of the carding v1.1 comes with 8 Carding methods. These are all tested and 100% verified to work. The bot has inbuilt credit cards database. You can unlock available cards from the CC manager and start carding right away.

What Can You Card With The Bot

  • Amazon
  • Apple
  • Clothing sites
  • Gift Cards
  • CashApp
  • PayPal
  • Western Union
  • Coinbase

Features Of Carding Bot

Integrated CC Database

You don’t need to buy a card from outside store, Easily unlock CC from The CC database and use it for carding

Balance Checker

Do not card without checking the balance of your card first. Use Balance checker, please note it will charge 50 points due to premium APIs to connect to banking system

Inbuilt Proxies/VPN

Depending on the site security, the bot will choose the right proxies to match card billing. The bot uses unique proxy IP per each Carding

Inbuilt Mailbox

Each Carding will create a new email address which you can access from the mail Panel. You don’t need to copy anything from the inbox like 2fa keys since the app does that automatically. Use the mail just to get updates of what is going on

Phone Number Service

Get Each unique number for each account created. Again the app uses paid services to get phone numbers. This is to ensure non blacklisted numbers for each activity

Captcha Resolver

Most of the accounts created have captcha at each form. The app uses anti Captcha Solving APIs which are also premium to ensure 100% success

Instant Cashout

You can cashout your carded items when the carding process is complete. Eg, you can cashout Coinbase bitcoin once they reflect in your balance. No delays,

Unlimited Carding

Once you have enough credits, you can card as much as you want. The app changes proxies, phone, email etc. each time you card 

How To Card Using Carding Bot

Here are the basic guides on how to install and run carding bot for the first time. You can also jump to the full video tutorial by clicking the video link below

Video Guide

Download and Install the Setup File

Download The archive from : https://cardingbot.ru The file is archived, extract and run the setup file. If it is the first time running the app, make sure you have a good internet connection as some files will be downloaded. Accept all prompts for the installations and wait for the app to finish installing

Launch The App

Now when everything installs fine, the app shortcut will be copied to the desktop. To run the app make sure you have a stable internet connection so all the functionalities work well. If you are running the app for the first time you can start thing by using a free starter code to give you 2000 points. Copy the code below to start

Unlock A Credit Card

To get started you need first to unlock a credit Card to unlock the functionalities of the app.Go to CC manager and select the type of card you want to unlock. Different cards have different limits and prices. You can use the coupon balance you added to unlock account

Balance Checker

You must check balance of the card first for the app to take note of the card balance. All cards unlocked on the app are compatible with the balance checker APi. Once you know the balance you can can card and set amount you know the card can hold

Carding Coinbase

Once you have a card with known balance. The methods for carding will be unlocked. Head on to coinbase method and start carding.The process is divided in to 3 steps Which are 90% automated you just have to input the values the app needs when requested. Just click on Create account, Choose the card you want to card with and proceed. The app will connect proxies depending on the card billing, When the app has created account, it will prompt you to verify the account. Click on verify, Next step is to buy btc, Depending on the card balance. Make sure the card can hold the charge. The Balance will display on your account

  • Create Account
  • Verify Account
  • Cashout Bitcoins

When Balance is in your Account, You can proceed to Cashout.

How to Withdraw from Carding Bot

Once you have successfully bought the btc, You can just send to your personal wallet from the app. Go to Cashout and enter your address and the amout you want to cashout. make sure you have enough credits to withdraw, else the app will prompt you add credits. If you don't have enough, just add the right amount needed to cashout. Use the +button at the credits balance to check bundles

How to Add Credits

Buy Credits from the official carding bot site cardingbot.ru Choose the right bundle for your carding. Pay using crypto payments available. You will get a redeem code. Redeem it in the app to add credit balance. Now go back to cashout and cashout the bitcoins you bought in Coinbase. Check the video below for full guide on adding credits to your account. You can card as many times as your credits can hold

COINBASE CARDING FULL VIDEO GUIDE

Here is a complete video guide on how to use the app. Please make sure you download the app from the official site of cardingbot.ru  This guide covers the Carding Coinbase method. You can can card any unlocked method on the app. make sure you have enough credits to complete carding. You can always add credits from the official site.
